title: Email Flooding Vuln

profile.name: Uzbey
profile.about: The goal of Uzbey is to create the worlds largest selfie to be launched into space. test @jobert

vulnerability_information:
Your contact us form has no captcha implementation. NOW THIS IS NOT DOS VULNERABILITY. it is called as logical flaw in your website.

By using your contact us form I can flood anyone's email id on the planet.

Because once contact us form has been filled your application gives back reply to the email id given to the server. Ideally it should not be happen else anyone in the world can give my email id with 1000 request and I will be flooded by your server 1000 times.

That is why either you should stop giving message to client that "WE HAVE RECEIVED YOUR REQUEST AND REQ NO IS 'XYZ' OUR REVIEW TEAM " or you should implement captcha system on your form..

There is a huge difference in DOS issue and this issue.
IN dos issue I try to send so many req so its upto your server that to respond me or not.
In this issue I use your server to flood someone...that is why it has higher impact. and I am reporting this.

Detailed Video is attached here IN LINK...Kindly see. Its nt DOS vuln..its called logical flaw .email flooding.

VIDEO TUTORIAL LINK - DONWLOAD AND SEE FOR HIGH QUALITY OR SEE ONLINE WITH LESS QUALITY. - https://www.dropbox.com/s/3f5vdn1q6xxza66/Email%20flooding%20UZbey.mp4?m=
vulnerability_information_html:
Your contact us form has no captcha implementation. NOW THIS IS NOT DOS VULNERABILITY. it is called as logical flaw in your website.

By using your contact us form I can flood anyone's email id on the planet.

Because once contact us form has been filled your application gives back reply to the email id given to the server. Ideally it should not be happen else anyone in the world can give my email id with 1000 request and I will be flooded by your server 1000 times.

That is why either you should stop giving message to client that "WE HAVE RECEIVED YOUR REQUEST AND REQ NO IS 'XYZ' OUR REVIEW TEAM " or you should implement captcha system on your form..

There is a huge difference in DOS issue and this issue.
IN dos issue I try to send so many req so its upto your server that to respond me or not.
In this issue I use your server to flood someone...that is why it has higher impact. and I am reporting this.

Detailed Video is attached here IN LINK...Kindly see. Its nt DOS vuln..its called logical flaw .email flooding.

VIDEO TUTORIAL LINK - DONWLOAD AND SEE FOR HIGH QUALITY OR SEE ONLINE WITH LESS QUALITY. - https://www.dropbox.com/s/3f5vdn1q6xxza66/Email%20flooding%20UZbey.mp4?m=

activities.message: So in this video I got 2 mails from your server however as I made so many request your server seems to be busy in replying me..so later on I got many mails from your server that you have received my query. So seems my email id chintangurjar@outlook.com is flooded by your application.

activities.message:
Hi,
This looks like a low-impact issue to me, not sure whether we'll fix this. I'll discuss with other team members and get back to you.

Thanks for sending this report to us, keep hunting.
activities.markdown_message:
Hi,
This looks like a low-impact issue to me, not sure whether we'll fix this. I'll discuss with other team members and get back to you.

Thanks for sending this report to us, keep hunting.

activities.message:
See, issue affect 2 things
1. you server remains busy..as it cant re-send email to the client that we have recived your request.
2.Legitimate client gets flooded by your server.

Thus how this 2 small impact issues become medium impact and if your server remains busy in sending 1000 mails to the victim...then its an high impact issue..

lets suppose u r victim i am attacker and one of my friend mr messy is a legitimate user

i sent 1000 mails from ur email id so u will get 1000 mails..back so after 10 minutes if legitimate user sends one mail then he will have to wait untill all 1000 mails have been reverted back to you..once thats completed then he will get his original mail back.....

activities.message: Even though this may be a low issue, it is something that should be fixed.  I guess to begin with at least with a captcha (just something that is easy to implement).  Thanks for your report.  Look forward to receiving some more.
activities.markdown_message: Even though this may be a low issue, it is something that should be fixed. I guess to begin with at least with a captcha (just something that is easy to implement). Thanks for your report. Look forward to receiving some more.

activities.message:
yes and if you see any corporate website they never return back thank you email or we will contact you back email. Because it causes email flooding what so ever...bt as per your application if you feel so that we want to keep that response mail as it is then best way to patch this is captcha. Also provide extra sort of mechanism such as one session cookie which gets changed every time after submitting 1 form. 

So even if I do automation..I wont be able to send form over same session cookie.. thus hw it is bullet proof mechanism of my bug.. and it is not low impact bug  TO USE YOUR APPLICATION TO FLOOD 3RD PARTY is a medium or high level bug.

Thank you for your report.
